abstract.para: Package Management System is the application/configuration tool that is used to add and remove the packages to/from the system flawlessly. Package Management System is a (very important) component of the planned management framework.

sect1.para:
Within the scope of Uludag Package Management System Project:
The user requirements for the Package Management System will be determined, The features to be provided by the packages, components of package metadata, configuration features of packages will be identified in line with these requirements, The guidelines for preparing packages in accordance with the Package Management System framework will be determined and a packager/developer manual will be prepared, The Package Management System will be designed according to the user requirements, The Package Management System will be coded according to the above design, The Package Management System will be tested on the reference system for final acceptance.
Project contact: Alp Öztarhan, alp@uludag.org.tr
